= May 11, 2002 =
All hail Rankorr, Norrath's newest owner of a pair of Claws of the Savage Spirit. Now, I wasn't there, but I heard he and a bunch of casters headed off to Fungus Grove and spanked Draz Nurakk silly. Now he's all shiny and uber and stuff. Holy jeez, I wanna lick 'em.
